## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Carreras v. Carreras
**판결일**: 1905-06-24
**법원**: Supreme Court of Puerto Rico
**관할**: Puerto Rico, PR

**판사**: Figueras, Hernández, Leary, Mac, Quiñones, Take, Wolf

## 변호인

Mr. Alvarez Nava for appellant., Mr. Mendez Vaz for respondent.

## 인용

- 9 P.R. 207

## 판결문 요약


Mr. Justice Hernández
delivered the opinion of the court.
On December 15, 1903, Attorney Pascasio Fajardo, on behalf of José del Carmen Domingo Carreras é Yrizarry, a minor, the latter represented also by his guardian ad litem.
